entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 27. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
